name: A. Venkata Subramanyam
content: IIIT-Delhi Skip to main content -A A A+ AA A V Subramanyam A V Subramanyam Head (ECE) & Professor (ECE, CSE) PhD (2012), Nanyang Technological University, Singapore Contact Details +91 011-26907437 subramanyam@iiitd.ac.in Web Profile B-604 (R&D Block) Profile I completed my Ph.D. at Nanyang Technological University, Singapore and undergraduate studies at Indian School of Mines University, Dhanbad, India. I work in the area of Multimedia and Vision, Image Processing and, Machine Learning. In particular, I am working on problems in fine-grained object recognition with applications to object re-identification and visual tracking, adversarial attacks, and cross modal recognition. I am a recipient of the Early Career Research Award, Department of Science and Technology. Our research group â€“ Visual Conception Group maintains an active collaboration with leading institutes like NUS Singapore, QUT Australia, NII Japan, and UiT Norway. Research Interests Multimedia and Vision Machine Learning Teaching Interests Statistical Machine Learning Digital Image Processing Digital Signal Processing Signals and Systems Multimedia Security Affiliated Centres & Labs Infosys Centre for Artificial Intelligence (CAI) Visual Conception Group
